0.0.5.name: connect20/Boku_Paymentgateway
0.0.5.description:
This is a Payment Gateway integration for Boku (Pay by mobile).
The Boku system takes payment from a mobile phone rather than a credit or debit card.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
